gui_bot_flag: Orange buttons can get you flagged as a bot by ModDB for 2h if used to often
msg_welcome_message: Welcome to the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Vanilla Idealization Project installer
msg_complete_installation: Installation complete. You can now launch the MO2 instance of the modpack from the desktop
msg_addon_already_extracted: Addon already extracted, using cached version located at: %s
msg_addon_already_downloaded: Addon already downloaded, using cached version located at: %s
msg_addon_delete_old_version: Deleting content of the previous version of this addon in %s
msg_create_shortcut: Creating shortcut to the modpack MO2 instance on the desktop
msg_continue_installation_desc: An error occurred during the last installation. Do you want to continue the installation?
err_invalid_installation_directory: Please move the installer into the MO2 directory
err_extract_fail: Failed to extract %s. Skipping to next addon
err_download_stop: The download stopped with status code %s
err_download_page_load: The download page of this addon is not responding with status code %s
